Changes
=======

Version 0.5.10
-------------

* Fixed unicode errors when last-editor header contains unicode characters

Version 0.5.9
-------------

* Changed ajax-url from template block just in case someone drops the header block in the base template

Version 0.5.8
-------------

* Improve robustness against malformed search strings

Version 0.5.7
-------------

* Django 1.3 compatibility

Version 0.5.6
-------------

* Fix typo ($ instead of &) in restart_script reload mode.

Version 0.5.5
-------------

* Fixed translation when label was in two or more catalog. A priority 
calculation mismatch.

Version 0.5.4
-------------

* Fixed some spanish translations.
